pages.body:
Un-categorized:
----------------------------------
Lista de cosas que tienen swag.

Doing things on the swag way
================================
Add here your arts. Be sure that you attach cool staff.

Export-swag: [[gh-pages to .zite RECETA]]
-------------------------------

Tutorial on how to move your gh-pages from clear to dark net:

> Vamos a decir, en un supuesto, título útil y descriptivo: "*¿Cómo parsear **mi rama gh-pages** desde un repositorio **hasta un .Zite**?*"

***To admins***: To be moved if not swag enough?

----------------------------------

Export-swag: [[gh-pages to .zite RECETA]]
-------------------------------

Tutorial on how to move your gh-pages from clear to dark net:

> Vamos a decir, en un supuesto, título útil y descriptivo: "¿Cómo parsear **mi rama gh-pages** desde un repositorio **hasta un .Zite**?

***To admins***: To be moved if not swag enough?

KEYWORDS 
====================
[[swag]] - tutorials - doing things swaggy way 
Parse gh-pages to .zite

STATUS
=====================
Initial commit, just started. Please, contribute. Wip.

CONTEXT
============
[question about wikism](https://irka.io/discussion/view/1360/question-about-wikism)

*Iniciado por* mmm hace 11 días con **respuestas (1)**
> is there some light the "big plan" could bring for a more distributed wikist culture? i.e. to wikimedia features as: see what links here, text format, export, undo. or any these features  into other type of contents (not only text, but i.e. photo). in the past there was a couple of whitepapers... if you want to add some more documentational bits about it, i'd like to  forward it, cheers. 

*Creada por* psy hace 4 días
> ZeroWiki (**first release launched yesterday**): https://zero.irka.io/138R53t3ZW7KDfSfxVpWUsMXgwUnsDNXLP/

DOCUMENT TYPE
=========================
Este documento es una receta spanglish para *parsear* una rama gh-pages [1] de un repositorio en un *.zite* [2] [3].

- [1] Docs on gh-pages, https://help.github.com/categories/github-pages-basics/

- [2] Docs on Zite, https://zero.irka.io/138R53t3ZW7KDfSfxVpWUsMXgwUnsDNXLP/?Page:zite

 - [3] Docs on Start-up a site: http://zeronet.readthedocs.io/en/latest/using_zeronet/create_new_site/

CONTENT
=========================
Vale, ok, I'm gonna take: Ataraxia Archive *gh-pages* [1] to set a demo while speeching de tutorial.

- [1] Tutorial demo files: https://github.com/aleph1888/ataraxia_archive/tarball/gh-pages

¿Cómo se crea un .Zite?
------------------------------------------------
Necesitas: 

a) Un **Content.json** [1] especificando la *estructura del contenido*. Ver ejemplo html [2].

- [1] Creación de un Content.json genérico: https://irka.io/photos/image/1309/what-is-a-contentjson-file

- [2] Contenido demo files: Task #1: Parse index.html to Content.json: https://github.com/aleph1888/ataraxia_archive/blob/gh-pages/index.html

Como de por sí el material que hay en gh-pages es 100% compatible con el material que se alberga en un .zite, you are done!

Extras
---------------------------------
Come to irka with your [1] website (.zite) so it will be uploaded to darknet. Watch tutorial [2]!

- [1] Docs on website, zero.irka.io: https://zero.irka.io/138R53t3ZW7KDfSfxVpWUsMXgwUnsDNXLP/?Page:website

- [2] Docs on How to upload my own zite from zero.irka.io: [pendiente]
